overview: Conny is unemployed. With the help of friend Holly, the good-for-nothing sneaks a job in the garage of her bulging mother Marlies. When the mature thoroughbred mare catches the constantly horny couple banging in the hall, Marlies also begins to keep an eye on Conny. The very next day, Marlies puts her juicy mouthpiece over Conny's stiffly blown glans and seduces the son-in-law into Spe according to all the rules of MILF art. Gina is madly in love with the gardener Diether, which is a thorn in the side of Mother Waltraud. Secretly, the big-titted, old bitch also stands on the always ready bam and hatches a perfidious plan to maneuver her daughter's potent engraver into her own bed. Look forward to two refreshingly horny triangle stories.
tagline: Feature, Hardcore, European, Tattoos, Piercings, Stockings, Outdoors
title: Die Mutter Meiner Freundin 4
